alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:34AM MST until January 19 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and difficult travel conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Highest amounts south of I-94 to US-212. * WHERE...Northern Rosebud and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will become slick and snow-covered on Tuesday as temperatures fall to the teens and 20s, potentially forming a glaze of ice before the snow accumulates. Localized blowing snow is also expected. Please allow extra time for your Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
